mapper.sql:
select hq.creation_time , hq.health_questionnaire_id , hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 , hq.adl , hq.mobility_out , hq.falls , hq.weight_loss , hq.diseases , hq.pa_minutes , hq.pa_willingness , hq.flu_vaccine , hq.polypharmacy , hq.social , hq.fv_serves , hq.total_score , hq.risk_level , hq.answers_json , hq.allergy_history , ui.last_login_date , hq.version , hq.update_time , ui.password , ui.registration_date , hq.common_medication , hq.name , hq.exercise_frequency , ui.phone_number , hq.residence , hq.chronic_disease , hq.age , hq.diet_preference , ui.username
FROM health_questionnaire hq left join user_info ui on hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id
mapper.select:
select hq.creation_time , hq.health_questionnaire_id , hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 , hq.adl , hq.mobility_out , hq.falls , hq.weight_loss , hq.diseases , hq.pa_minutes , hq.pa_willingness , hq.flu_vaccine , hq.polypharmacy , hq.social , hq.fv_serves , hq.total_score , hq.risk_level , hq.answers_json , hq.allergy_history , ui.last_login_date , hq.version , hq.update_time , ui.password , ui.registration_date , hq.common_medication , hq.name , hq.exercise_frequency , ui.phone_number , hq.residence , hq.chronic_disease , hq.age , hq.diet_preference , ui.username
FROM health_questionnaire hq left join
user_info
ui on hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
